name: Gatos Park
description:
Gatos Park is an MMORPG game with a lot of minigame collections that you can play. Make friends and chat with another player. Show off your style with items and skin. Most importantly, Have Fun!

  • Status: Demo Prototype Game

~ Made with Unity ~

Developer: Jonas Tan (aka. Joen TNT)

Special Thanks to:
  • Jessica, MyZone2003 (Environment Art)
  • Saud, Darmuth (Game Designer)

"We are currently completing the features, the game may have some missing feature in a moment. Also, because yet I have no server to deploy the game to be able to live multiplayer with other players, temporarily this will be a solo game. Sorry for the inconvenience."

Your comment and feedback will be appreciated. We need your further feedback by filling this form for a few moments. Thank You! Click Here to fill the feedback form.
